original_text: Yet I tell you that not even Solomon in all his splendor was dressed like one of these.
korean_text: 그러나 내가 너희에게 말하노니 솔로몬의 모든 영광으로도 입은 것이 이 꽃 하나만 같지 못하였느니라

sentences.original_text: that not even Solomon in all his splendor
was dressed like one of these.
sentences.korean_translation: 이것들 중 하나처럼 옷 입지 아니하였느니라
